summary: Replaces the mesh for Spellbreaker shield with the mesh of the Steel Shield
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the mesh for Spellbreaker shield with the mesh of the Steel Shield

I have two versions of the steel shield.
- One replaces the meshes with the steel shield mesh, with original color of the Steel shield (or with any retexture of the steel shield)

- The other replaces the mesh and the Steel shield textures to a black version of the shield. (These will overwrite any retextures of the steel shield since the mesh file refers to the steel shield texture files)

I hope you like and endorse :)


[size="4"]Done upon request[/size]


[size="4"]Other replacements of spellbreaker:[/size]
Spellbreaker to Blades Shield
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7142
author: 92DemonKing

files.name: Spellbreaker to steel shield mesh replacement only
files.fileName: Spellbreaker to steel shield mesh replacement only-7216-1-0.rar
